SELECT a.statistics_city_name cityName, SUM(CONVERT(IFNULL(a.budget_total, 0), DECIMAL (10, 2))) total FROM t_oa_marketing_apply a WHERE a.statistics_city_name is not null AND a.statistics_city_name != ''
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY a.statistics_city_name

SELECT a.uid, a.project_name projectName, a.budget_month budgetMonth, b.table_info tableInfo, a.approval_status FROM t_oa_marketing_apply a LEFT JOIN t_oa_active_form b ON a.uid = b.uid
b.table_name = '预算执行明细'
and a.project_name LIKE concat('%',#{subParam.projectName},'%')
and a.budget_month LIKE concat('%',#{subParam.budgetMonth},'%')
and b.table_info LIKE concat('%',#{subParam.km1},'%')
and a.statistics_city_name =#{subParam.statisticsCityName}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{subParam.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{subParam.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and a.approval_status = #{subParam.approvalStatus}
order by update_time desc
